data.expected_result: Messages from blocked users are hidden by a warning in Pinned Messages like in Search
data.short_description: Blocked user messages appear in Pinned Messages without a warning
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a server which you have Manage Messages permission in - Block a user who's commented in chat - Pin their message - Open the Pinned Messages modal in the channel and observe the message being displayed without a warning of the user being blocked
